nodes.text: The Voice of Unreason: James Earl Jones Speaks

The Voice of Unreason: James Earl Jones Speaks is an article about James Earl Jones, the actor who gave voice to Darth Vader. The article also gave his views on his other acting roles and how he got them. The interview was conducted by Calum Waddell, appearing in Star Wars Insider 118. It was later reprinted in Star Wars Insider Special Edition 2012.
